name: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
review: A profound novel that explores racial injustice in the Deep South.

author: George Orwell
review: A chilling dystopian novel that delves into the dangers of totalitarianism.

name: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
review: A timeless romance that critiques the British class system.

name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: A tragic love story set in the Roaring Twenties that critiques the American Dream.

name: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
review: An exploration of teenage angst and alienation through the eyes of Holden Caulfield.

name: Moby-Dick
author: Herman Melville
review: A complex and symbolic narrative about obsession and the sea.
